title: Rust doesn't build in debug mode

labels.name: A-debuginfo
labels.description: Area: Debugging information in compiled programs (DWARF, PDB, etc.)

body:
https://gist.github.com/GuillaumeGomez/63280240ff65fdff6a6e

```
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports
```
